wikipedia_page.main: Ian Henderson (31 October 1918 – 11 June 1991) was a Scotland international rugby union player.

response: *Ian Henderson (footballer) (born 1985), English footballer for Salford City
*Ian Henderson (police officer) (1927–2013), British former Director of Intelligence in Bahrain
*Ian Henderson (politician) (born 1940), member of the Queensland Parliament
*Ian Henderson (rugby league) (born 1983), English-born Scottish rugby league player
*Ian Henderson (RAF officer) (1896–1918), English World War I flying ace

Ian Henderson (born 23 April 1983) is a former professional rugby league footballer who last played for the Sydney Roosters in the NRL. A Scotland international , his brothers, Andrew Henderson and Kevin, are also international rugby league players.,
